title: Sea bass with crab mayonnaise, roasted fennel and orange
description: This recipe for sea bass with crab mayonnaise uses orange to cut the sweetness of the crab. Perfectly balanced for summer eating.
ingredients: 1 live brown crab, about 1kg/2lb 4oz, placed in the freezer an hour before cooking
sea salt and freshly ground black pepper
1 orange, peel and pith removed, segmented and diced
1 lemon, zest, finely grated, and juice
salt and freshly ground black pepper
